entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow Shower and Blowing Snow, -13.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 3:18 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow Shower and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -13.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -18.9°C
Wind: WSW 49 km/h gust 82 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls ending overnight then partly cloudy. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas this evening. Wind becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the morning then rising. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the morning then rising. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
